thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: NURUL
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by NURUL

author: NURUL
title: NURUL
text: Easy pick up and drop off at Perth Airport. Choose the top dog, pre-pay your fuel and you are good to go. As a renter, we are responsible to check on the battery expiry date, tyre pressure, usb charging port, aircon, tools, spare tyre and etc before you move vehicle. I enjoy my perth holiday with Redspot. Vehicle was maintain well. Negative reviews are from people who are irresponsible and complacent. Every rental company in every countries has the same policy. Drive safely and do take care of their vehicles.
